description: The high-speed train collided with a maintenance machine in Soure in the region of Coimbra.
title: Coimbra train crash: Two dead after train derails in Portugal
title_page: Coimbra train crash: Two dead after train derails in Portugal - BBC News
maintext: "We were stuck inside the carriage, because the doors were destroyed. Someone managed to break one of them and we started to get out and help other people get out."
